issue.title: [R] Handle n_distinct() with args != 1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14226](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14226). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-14035 and others add count_distinct support to our dplyr functions, but supporting multiple arguments was deferred to ARROW-14209. So we should check for the unsupported cases and error informatively.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14226?focusedCommentId=17428998) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11407
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11407>
